body: Es la sensaci√≥n que me ha transportado esta experiencia. Por supuesto el producto es excelente y el trabajo en las elaboraciones se nota, no se trata de una cocina con muchos adornitos. Quiz√°s por ser Agosto pero no he encontrado sabores en los platos que me volvieran loco y un servicio demasiado rob√≥tico, en exceso estirado.
translation: It is the feeling that this experience has carried me. Of course the product is excellent and the work on the dishes shows, it is not a kitchen with many decorations. There's a lot of work to be done to get these dishes built, but...i don't know, he didn't convince me. Maybe it's August but I haven't found flavors in the dishes that drove me crazy and too much robotic, overstretched service.

body: Es una gran experiencia y nos ha gustado mucho. Algunos platos sorprendentes como el calamar, las almejas, el bloody mary o el salmorejo. Otros platos nos han decepcionado bastante como la sopa de cebolla o el at√∫n, creo que no es un buen modo de terminar este tipo de men√∫, ya que pienso que deber√≠a ir de menos a m√°s siempre.El fallo mas grande pero es oir al cocinero gritar frases como "a vuestra pu ta casa" a los trabajadores, bastante desagradable, desde donde est√°bamos sentados se escuchaba todo.
translation: It's a great experience and we really liked it. Some amazing dishes like squid, clams, bloody mary or salmorejo. Other dishes have disappointed us quite like onion soup or tuna, I think it is not a good way to finish this type of menu, since I think it should go from less to more always.The biggest mistake but it is to hear the cook shout phrases like "to your fucking house" to the workers, quite unpleasant, from where we were sitting everything was heard.

body: Comer en Abac es una experiencia vital que recomiendo a todos los amantes de la gastronom√≠a.Nos sorprendi√≥ y gust√≥ todo, desde el principio hasta el final. Una explosi√≥n de sabores en platos muy originales que se presentan de las formas m√°s curiosas e interesantes. El personal es muy amable y conoce perfectamente tanto el oficio como los platos que sirven. En resumen: una maravilla.Si tengo que poner una pega, dir√≠a que el men√∫ actual se centra demasiado en el producto de mar. Son sabores y texturas muy potentes y especiales que pueden no gustar a todos, o ser dif√≠ciles de entender para algunos.No obstante, nos encant√≥ y salimos muy contentos.El precio: el esperable para 3 estrellas Michelin.
translation: Eating at Abac is a vital experience that I recommend to all food lovers. We were surprised and liked everything from the beginning to the end. An explosion of flavors in very original dishes that are presented in the most curious and interesting ways. The staff is very friendly and knowledgeable of both the trade and the dishes they serve. In short: a wonder.If I have to put a hitch, I would say that the current menu focuses too much on seafood. They are very powerful and special flavors and textures that may not like everyone, or be difficult for some to understand.Nevertheless, we loved it and came out very happy.The price: the expected 3 Michelin stars.

body: Una pena.La comida sin pena ni gloria, de un 3 estrellas esperas que los platos te insten a querer repetirlos,que recuerdes su sabor...nada de eso.para colmo, el maitre tenia prisa por irse, cobrando a los comensales antes de pedir la cuenta.la atenci√≥n tampoco fue buena,llegas solo al garaje y desde ah√≠ te las apa√±as para que luego te traten como si fueses a un restaurante de 30 euros.El maridaje, para nosotros, otra decepci√≥n.Muy bueno el sake pero sinceramente un postre con cerveza como que no me apetece...y as√≠ todo
translation: A pity.The food without pity or glory, of a 3 star hotel you expect the dishes to urge you to want to repeat them, to remember their taste...none of that.to top it off, the maitre d' was in a hurry to leave, charging the diners before asking for the bill.the attention wasn't good either, you arrive alone in the garage and from there you manage to be treated as if you were going to a restaurant of 30 euros.The pairing, for us, another disappointment.Very good sake but sincerely a dessert with beer like I don't feel like it...and so on

body: La comida nada sorprendente y m√°s bien aburrida. Se salvaban las basadas en productos de calidad excelente como la gamba de Palamos. Del servicio, la camarera correcta pero lo de la sumiller es incre√≠ble. En una carta de vinos que parece el libro gordo de Petete no hab√≠a ni un s√≥lo vino de Castilla la Mancha y se lo comentamos a la sumiller. ¬øC√≥mo que no? Hay un mont√≥n!! contesto. Una similar de un restaurante de 3 estrellas!!! El amigo Jordi Cruz no debe medir por el mismo rasero a sus concursantes que a sus empleados. Por esto y por lo anodino de la comida me inclino por pensar que en agosto en Abac deben quedar s√≥lo los empleados en pr√°cticas . Mejor cerrar....pero quien renuncia a todas esas mesas llenas de turistas con buen billetero?
translation: The food is not surprising and rather boring. They saved those based on excellent quality products such as Palamos shrimp. From the service, the right waitress, but the sommelier thing is amazing. In a wine list that looks like Petete's big book there was not a single wine from Castilla la Mancha and we told the sommelier. What do you mean, no? There's a lot! I answer. After taking the book and turning pages and not finding it told us that "they had from there close!!" Up close, where? we asked him. Nearby she insisted. From Utiel-Requena perhaps? we wanted to help him. I shouldn't have known her either because she was dispatched with "Up close...from the plateau...from the north." A similar 3 star restaurant!!! The friend Jordi Cruz should not measure his contestants by the same standard as his employees. For this reason and for the nondescript of the food I am inclined to think that in August in Abac should remain only the employees in practice. Better to close...But who gives up all those tables full of tourists with a good wallet?

body: No he puesto las 5 estrellas porque, aunque la comida estaba buen√≠sima, esperaba m√°s. Quiz√° esperaba que los platos me sorprendieran m√°s. Por otro lado, el chef Jordi Cruz, pas√≥ por todas mesas a saludar y a preguntar c√≥mo hab√≠a ido la experiencia.
translation: I didn't put the 5 stars on because, although the food was great, I expected more. Maybe I expected the dishes to surprise me more. The staff were attentive and explained the dishes and wines well, although I did not want to say goodbye to the waiters when we left. Chef Jordi Cruz, on the other hand, went through all tables to greet and ask how the experience had gone.

translation: Very complete tasting menu and be surprised. It's getting better as the menu progresses and lives up to expectations. The service is very good and pleasant.

translation: My wife was there and I was a gift for her, I was very excited, I won't comment on the food since with my experience and my age I understand that everything is tastes and experiences, but there are things that are not up to scratch A 3 star michel√≠n service from the customer enters until the one that leaves through the door has to be exceptional, the sommelier was wonderful but the maitre is not up to it since when he presented the dishes apart from looking like a robot siri without looking into your eyes. It seemed that I was in class repeating a poetry without looking or expressing each time had less illusion and in the farewell seemed a wedding hall.On the other hand the salon had the curtains off the glass very badly The music very high, better without music and when charging more 250‚Ç¨per person a tasteless farewell. body: Me habr√≠a encantado poner 5 estrellas, pero soy cel√≠aca y lo cierto es que, en ese sentido, he percibido fallos enormes.Notifiqu√© mi intolerancia al gluten en el momento de la reserva. En cuanto llegu√© al restaurante volv√≠ a recordarlo.Solicit√© maridaje de vinos y... ¬°me sirvieron cerveza! (con cebada y, por tanto, gluten). Con uno de los postres, justo antes de meterme la cuchara a la boca, vino un camarero corriendo a quit√°rmelo porque conten√≠a gluten.Mientras al resto de comensales les sirven un pan elaborado por ellos de masa madre, a m√≠ me pusieron un pan peque√±o y descongelado (por cierto, mal descongelado y tuvieron que meterlo de nuevo en el horno).Aparte de todo eso, igual que le sucedi√≥ a la mujer al√©rgica al queso que ha escrito otra rese√±a, no me sustituyeron lo que conten√≠a gluten de los platos. No hab√≠a alternativa, simplemente lo quitaban. Es m√°s, uno de los platos del men√∫ ni me lo trajeron. Al quejarme de todo esto al final del servicio optaron por descontarme 30‚Ç¨ de la cuenta.Un restaurante de tres estrellas Michel√≠n no puede cometer este tipo de errores con una intolerancia alimenticia. Primero y m√°s importante porque est√° en juego la salud. Segundo porque, como cel√≠aca, tengo igual derecho que todos los comensales a disfrutar de la misma cantidad de platos.
translation: I would have loved to put on 5 stars, but I am celiac and the truth is that, in that sense, I have perceived huge failures.I reported my intolerance to gluten at the time of booking. As soon as I got to the restaurant I remembered again. I asked for wine pairing and... they served me beer! (with barley and therefore gluten). With one of the desserts, just before I put the spoon in my mouth, a waiter came running to take it away because it contained gluten.While the rest of the diners are served a bread made by them from sourdough, I was put on a small and defrosted bread (by the way, badly defrosted and they had to put it back in the oven).Apart from all that, just as happened to the woman allergic to cheese who has written another review, I was not substituted for what contained gluten from the dishes. There was no alternative, they just took it away. What's more, one of the dishes on the menu didn't even bring it to me. When I complained about all this at the end of the service, they chose to deduct 30‚Ç¨ from my bill. A three-star Michelin restaurant cannot make such mistakes with a food intolerance. First and foremost because health is at stake. Secondly, as a celiac, I have the same right as all the guests to enjoy the same amount of dishes.

translation: I would have loved to put on 5 stars, but I am celiac and the truth is that, in that sense, I have perceived huge failures.I reported my intolerance to gluten at the time of booking. As soon as I got to the restaurant I remembered again. I asked for wine pairing and... they served me beer! (with barley and therefore gluten). There was no alternative, they just took it away. What's more, one of the dishes on the menu didn't even bring it to me. When I complained about all this at the end of the service, they chose to deduct 30‚Ç¨ from my bill. A three-star Michelin restaurant cannot make such mistakes with a food intolerance. First and foremost because health is at stake. Secondly, as a celiac, I have the same right as all the guests to enjoy the same amount of dishes.

body: No tengo gran experiencia en restaurantes michelinizados, as√≠ que mi opini√≥n no sirve para comparar con otros. El espacio me gust√≥ mucho, el servicio estuvo atento sin avasallar y con profesionalidad, el encargado del vino supo lo que nos hac√≠a falta, la comida nos gust√≥ sin duda ninguna (aunque alguna "tonter√≠a" podr√≠a suprimirse perfectamente). Resumiendo, una experiencia que vale la pena, aunque sin duda por el precio que tiene se puede comer muy-muy bien en muchos otros sitios.En el lado un poco negativo, pienso que los postres no estuvieron a la altura, que la vajilla debe repensarse/actualizarse y que los caf√©s eran manifiestamente mejorables.
translation: I don't have much experience in michelinized restaurants, so my opinion doesn't compare to others. I liked the space very much, the service was attentive without being overwhelmed and professionally, the wine manager knew what we needed, the food we definitely liked none (although some "nonsense" could be perfectly suppressed). In short, an experience worth it, although certainly for the price it has can be eaten very-very well in many other places.On the slightly negative side, I think the desserts were not up to scratch, that the crockery should be rethought/updated and that the coffees were manifestly improved.

body: Quiz√°s ten√≠amos unas expectativas altas sobre la visita al Abac, pero al mismo tiempo l√≥gico por ser un 3 estrellas Michelin.El servicio en general voluntarioso y en definitiva correcto. La comida, casi nada que podamos reprochar, pero despu√©s de pagar 325‚Ç¨ por cabeza no puedo decir Wow!! El menu degustaci√≥n incluye mas de 15 platos, correcto en cantidad y equilibrio, pero puedo decir que casi ning√∫n plato (excepto la caja china) no puedo decir Wow! Y eso es indicativo que nos queda un regusto a experiencia insuficiente. El precio vs calidad de los platos, por debajo de expectativas claramente. Creo que llegar hasta arriba es muy dif√≠cil, pero mas dif√≠cil es mantenerse, y no me han quedado canas de repetir, y eso es mala se√±al.Me gustar√≠a opinar algo distinto, pero esto es lo que he vivido hoy.
translation: Perhaps we had high expectations about the visit to the Abac, but at the same time logical for being a 3 Michelin stars.The service in general voluntary and ultimately correct. The food, almost nothing we can reproach, but after paying 325‚Ç¨ per head I can not say Wow!! The tasting menu includes more than 15 dishes, correct in quantity and balance, but I can say that almost no dish (except the Chinese box) I can't say Wow! And that's indicative that we have a taste of insufficient experience left. The price vs quality of the dishes, below expectations clearly. I think getting to the top is very difficult, but it is harder to keep, and I have not been tired of repeating, and that is a bad sign.I would like to say something different, but this is what I have lived today.

body: Cuando escoges un lugar como este para comer, ya sabes que estas apunto de subirte a un Rolls Royce y todo lo que comporta eso. Y la excelencia en todo, es lo que esperas. El local esta decorado de una manera muy c√°lida y acogedora. Pero si entras por el parking te pierdes gran parte del encanto del jard√≠n. El servicio es muy amable, pero en seg√∫n que platos not√© poca pasi√≥n y mucha rapidez a la hora de explicarlos (como la azafata de un avi√≥n cuando explica donde se encuentran las salidas de emergencia). El producto que nos sirvieron , su calidad y su presentaci√≥n fue en la mayor√≠a de platos, excelente. Alg√∫n plato, en mi opini√≥n, no me gusto. Comerte con cuchara unas burbujas.............no me sugiri√≥ absolutamente nada. Y los "dulces en calabaza" tampoco me gustaron. La sopa de cebolla y el bocadillo de anguila fueron sensacionales. Y en cuanto al precio...................pues bien, bajo mi punto de vista, el precio esta muy elevado. He estado en otros tres estrellas y cuando he acabado de comer y pagar, no me ha dado la sensaci√≥n de que era demasiado caro. En este local, si me la dio. 300 ‚Ç¨ por persona. Sin pasarme con el vino, claro. Pero te cobran 28 ‚Ç¨ por dos copas de cava y 11 ‚Ç¨ por un carajillo. En fin...............es un gran restaurante, pero hay muchos mas de tres estrellas donde la relaci√≥n calidad/precio es mucho mejor.
translation: When you pick a place like this to eat, you know you're about to get on a Rolls Royce and everything that comes with that. And excellence in everything is what you expect. The place is decorated in a very warm and welcoming manner. However, if you enter the car park, you will lose much of the charm of the garden. The service is very friendly, but according to which dishes I noticed little passion and a lot of speed when explaining them (like the flight attendant of a plane when explaining where the emergency exits are). The product we were served, its quality and presentation was in most dishes, excellent. Some dish, in my opinion, I don't like. Eat some bubbles with a spoon.............he didn't suggest anything at all. And I didn't like the pumpkin candy either. The onion soup and eel snack were sensational. And as for the price..................well, in my view, the price is very high. I've been to three other stars and when I've finished eating and paying, it hasn't given me the feeling it was too expensive. In this place, he gave it to me. 300 ‚Ç¨ per person. Without going over the wine, of course. But they charge you ‚Ç¨28 for two glasses of cava and ‚Ç¨11 for a snail. Anyway...............it is a great restaurant, but there are many more than three stars where the quality / price ratio is much better.

body: No defrauda la experiencia de 3 estrellas a mi quizas se me hizo hasta demasiado pero hay que reconocer el gran trabajo y dedicaci√≥n de todo el equipo
translation: I do not disappoint the experience of 3 stars to me maybe it was done to me too much but you have to recognize the great work and dedication of the whole team

body: El restaurante me envi√≥ por mail una confirmaci√≥n de la reserva para comer hoy d√≠a 27 de febrero de 2021 a las 13h. La reserva es para dos men√∫s prepagados porque se trata de un cheque regalo que me hicieron mis familiares.Llego al establecimiento y resulta que est√° cerrado con motivo del covid.Me parece del todo inaceptable que no se avise a los comensales con reserva de este hecho. Enviar un mail comunic√°ndolo no cuesta nada.
translation: The restaurant sent me by mail a confirmation of the reservation to eat today 27 February 2021 at 13h. The reservation is for two pre-paid menus because it is a gift check that my family members made me.I arrive at the establishment and it turns out that it is closed on the occasion of the covid.I find it completely unacceptable that diners are not warned with reservation of this fact. Sending an email communicating it costs nothing.

body: Lamentable, ten√≠amos la reserva desde octubre del a√±o pasado. A 5 d√≠as de la reserva, con confirmaci√≥n en el mail, se me ocurre llamar para reconfirmar, me topo con un contestador que dicen que est√°n cerrados. ¬øUn restaurante as√≠, con la cantidad de personal que tienen, aunque est√©n cerrados no deber√≠an tener a alguien para atender amablemente las llamadas? Pues no, un contestador. No solo eso, les mando un mail YO, y me dicen que est√°n cerrados por las medidas COVID. 1) No es cierto, los restaurantes pueden abrir de 13h a 16:30h. 2) ME PARECE INCREIBLE QUE UN RESTAURANTE CON 3 ESTRELLAS MICHELIN NO SE PONGAN EN CONTACTO CONMIGO PARA AVISARME DE QUE ME CANCELAN LA MESA 3). Ya no solo eso, sino que en el mail ESTANDAR me dicen que cancele yo la reserva a trav√©s de un mail. Perd√≥n??? Encima pretend√©is cobrarme si no cancelo yo la reserva? QUE VERGUENZA
translation: Unfortunately, we had the reservation since October last year. 5 days after booking, with confirmation in the mail, I think to call to reconfirm, I run into an answering machine that say they are closed. A restaurant like this, with the number of staff they have, even if they're closed shouldn't they have someone to take kindly to calls? No, an answering machine. Not only that, I e-mail them YO, and they tell me that they are closed by the measures COVID. 1) Not true, restaurants can open from 13h to 16:30h. 2) I FIND IT INCREDIBLE THAT A RESTAURANT WITH 3 MICHELIN STARS DO NOT CONTACT ME TO WARN ME THAT TABLE 3 IS CANCELED.) Not only that, but in the STANDARD mail they tell me to cancel the reservation through an email. Excuse me? Do you intend to charge me if I don't cancel the reservation? SHAME ON YOU

body: De los mejores restaurantes en los que he estado. Estaba todo riqu√≠simo y muy bien explicado. Es un sitio al que vas para vivir una experiencia gastron√≥mica.
translation: The best restaurants I've ever been to. It was all very rich and very well explained. It's a place you go to for a gastronomic experience.

body: Hablamos de un tres estrellas Michelin, es decir: la Excelencia. Pues va a ser que no. La comida, al fin y al cabo lo m√°s importante: ning√∫n pero. Buen producto, elaboraci√≥n correcta, pocas sorpresas pero sin reproches.La sala: acogedora, elegante, c√°lida. Bien.El servicio: aqu√≠ est√° el punto d√©bil. Envarado sin ser elegante. Se limita a describir los platos con la misma emoci√≥n con que una azafata indica las salidas de emergencia del avi√≥n. Si vas a proponerme una experiencia religiosa, al menos ponle un poco de sentimiento a la liturgia. Aparte, todav√≠a no ten√≠amos nuestras bebidas de aperitivo que ya nos hab√≠an servido el segundo plato. Tuvimos que pedir que rebajaran el ritmo pues parec√≠a que nos ametrallaban a platos. D√©jame el tiempo de reposar mi impresi√≥n sobre lo que acabo de degustar, por favor! Independientemente de nuestra mesa: platos que se caen, carritos que chocan, una botella que tambi√©n se cae....y un c√≥ctel del men√∫ degustaci√≥n que no se sirve y nadie sabe por qu√©. Los olvidos son humanos, y no pasa nada. Pero insisto: hablamos de tres estrellas. La Excelencia, que en nuestro caso no encontramos.Lo recomendamos? No. En Barcelona hay otras opciones mejores, algunas m√°s econ√≥micas y otras menos pretenciosas. Es solamente nuestra opini√≥n...
translation: We are talking about a three Michelin stars: Excellence. Well, it's not going to be. Food, after all, the most important thing: no buts. Good product, correct elaboration, few surprises but no reproaches.The room: cozy, elegant, warm. Good.The service: here's the weak point. Wrapped without being elegant. It merely describes the dishes with the same excitement as a flight attendant signals the plane's emergency exits. If you're going to propose to me a religious experience, at least put a little sentiment into the liturgy. Besides, we still didn't have our snack drinks that had already served us the second course. We had to ask them to slow down as it looked like we were machine-gunned to plates. Let me take the time to rest my impression on what I just tasted, please! Regardless of our table: dishes that fall off, bumper trolleys, a bottle that also falls off...and a cocktail from the tasting menu that is not served and no one knows why. Forgetfulness is human, and nothing happens. But I insist: we're talking three stars. Excellence, which in our case we do not find. We recommend it? No. In Barcelona there are other better options, some cheaper and others less pretentious. It's just our opinion...

body: Fuimos para darnos el capricho en nuestra luna de miel dado que no pudimos viajar a donde quer√≠amos.No lo considero una cena, sino m√°s bien una experiencia de casi 4 h en la que disfrutar de sabores y olores intensos, sorprendentes y en algunos casos desconocidos.El servicio fue excepcional y muchos de los platos los acababan de empatar o cocinar en la mesa.Para acompa√±ar los platos me ofrecieron un minimaridaje muy acertado de unos 50 ‚Ç¨.
translation: We went to indulge in our honeymoon because we couldn't travel where we wanted to.I don't consider it a dinner, but rather an almost 4-hour experience in which to enjoy intense, surprising and in some cases unknown flavors and smells.The service was exceptional and many of the dishes had just been tied up or cooked at the table.To accompany the dishes I was offered a very successful mini-match of about ‚Ç¨50.

body: Magnifica experiencia gastron√≥mica!! Trato inmejorable destacar la amabilidad y las explicaciones de Aitor todo un fen√≥meno!! Platos s√∫per elaborados con unos sabores y texturas que despiertan todos tus sentidos. La verdad que ha sido uno de los mejores aniversarios de bodas de nuestra vida üòç.

Primera vez en un Michelin y no podr√≠a haber tenido mejor experiencia, todo de 10, desde el local, la atenci√≥n, el espect√°culo, la comida y como colof√≥n final poder haber conocido a Jordi Cruz, que fue encantador. Una de las mejores experiencias de mi vida y que recomiendo 100%, merece la pena darse este lujazo una vez en la vida!!!
translation: First time in a Michelin and could not have had better experience, all of 10, from the local, the attention, the show, the food and as a final colophon to have met Jordi Cruz, who was charming. One of the best experiences of my life and I recommend 100%, it is worth giving this luxury once in a lifetime!!!

body: En nuestra segunda visita a este fant√°stico restaurante hemos vuelto a disfrutar del nivel gastron√≥mico que tiene Jordi Cruz. Variedad de t√©cnicas y sabores , con un producto de 10. Quiz√° en esta ocasi√≥n peque√±os errores han impedido dar la nota m√°xima, si bien sigue siendo un lugar donde poder gozar de una grandisima experiencia.
translation: On our second visit to this fantastic restaurant we have again enjoyed the gastronomic level that Jordi Cruz has. Variety of techniques and flavors, with a product of 10. Perhaps on this occasion small mistakes have prevented to give the maximum note, although it remains a place where to enjoy a great experience.

body: Hemos repetido para celebrar nuestro d√©cimo aniversario de boda, un acierto. Servicio excelente, con una m√°xima atenci√≥n, la comida espectacular desde los aperitivos, hasta los postres, seguro que volveremos!!!
translation: We have repeated to celebrate our tenth wedding anniversary, a success. Excellent service, with maximum attention, spectacular food from appetizers, to desserts, we will surely return!!

body: Este comentario quiero que sea constructivo para el chef. Ayer estuvimos comiendo en su restaurante y gran decepci√≥n. El trato en la sala un horror....tres veces nos mancharon el mantel sirviendo.....dos veces me mezclaron agua con gas con agua natural en el mismo vaso....la velocidad de servir y quitar los platos era vergonzosamente r√°pida....parec√≠a un rte.chino. Est√° bien que tenga chicos j√≥venes aprendiendo....pero que no sea todo el servicio....no hab√≠a nadie con algo de experiencia, ni un jefe de sala, para dar las pautas y sobre todo para ense√±arles y dirigirles. Al salir nadie se dirigi√≥ a nosotros para ver que tal la experiencia....es m√°s solo hab√≠a una persona en toda la sala. Creo que le sobran estrellas....le recomiendo que est√© m√°s tiempo en su negocio porque no se est√°n haciendo las cosas bien.
translation: I want this comment to be constructive for the chef. Yesterday we were eating at his restaurant and great disappointment. The deal in the room is a horror....three times we had our tablecloth stained serving.....twice I was mixed with gas water with natural water in the same glass...the speed of serving and removing dishes was embarrassingly fast...He looked like a Chinese art. It's okay that I have young boys learning...but don't let it be all the service....there was no one with any experience, nor a room manager, to give the guidelines and especially to teach and direct them. When we left, no one turned to us to see how the experience.....plus there was only one person in the whole room. I think he has plenty of stars...I recommend that you spend more time in your business because you are not getting things right.

body: Este restaurante es una gran experiencia tanto a nivel de sabores, colores, aromas, un servicio muy atento, todo bien sincronizado como si de una m√°quina de alta precisi√≥n se tratase. Por poner una muy peque√±a pega algun recipiente habr√≠a que renovar por la categor√≠a del restaurante. Por lo demas todo fenomenal sigo alucinando con la cocci√≥n de la ostra.
translation: This restaurant is a great experience both in terms of flavors, colors, aromas, a very attentive service, everything well synchronized as if it were a machine of high precision. To add a very small paste to a container, it is necessary to renew it for the category of the restaurant. Otherwise all phenomenal I still hallucinate with the cooking of the oyster.

body: Mi pareja me regal√≥ ir a ABaC,ya que sabia que me hac√≠a mucha ilusi√≥n ir.No nos ha decepcionado en absoluto. Fue un espectaculo tanto a nivel visual como gustativo. El camarero que nos sirvi√≥ fue muy cercano,amable y divertido,lo que ayud√≥ a que la velada fuese a√∫n mas agradable.Cuidan absolutamente todos los detalles,y uno que me sorprendi√≥ especialmente fue que tuvieron en cuenta que era zurda.En uno de los platos uno de los camareros me dice que me cambia la cuchara sin yo entender el motivo. Y resulta que la cuchara que usabamos estava pensada para diestros por su forma y a mi no me hubiese permitido tomar el caldo comodamente. No me habia dado ni cuenta! Per√≤ durante toda la cena tuvieron ese detalle en cuenta. No me habia pasado jam√°s! Y no es el primer restaurante con estrella Michelin al que vamos. Me pareci√≥ un detallazo.La guinda del pastel fue poder saludar y hacernos una foto con Jordi Cruz. Fue muy amable y simpatico.
translation: My partner gave me a gift to go to ABaC, as I knew I was very excited to go.We were not disappointed at all. It was a visual and taste show. The waiter who served us was very close, friendly and fun, which helped make the evening even more enjoyable.They take care of absolutely every detail, and one that surprised me especially was that they took into account that I was left-handed.In one of the dishes one of the waiters tells me to change the spoon without me understanding the motive. And it turns out that the spoon we used was designed for right-handers because of its shape and I wouldn't have been able to take the broth comfortably. I hadn't even noticed! But all through dinner they took that detail into account. It never happened to me! And it's not the first Michelin-starred restaurant we go to. I thought it was a detail.The icing on the cake was to be able to greet and take a picture with Jordi Cruz. He was very kind and friendly.

body: Una vez superas las objeciones y comparativas iniciales con otros reconocidos restaurantes de gran categor√≠a pero digamos m√°s convencionales entiendes que la √∫nica protagonista de toda la velada es la comida y sus diferentes y complejas elaboraciones. Los comensales pasamos a un segundo termino. Un festival de sabores que te sorprende plato tras plato. Las mesas est√°n iluminadas de una manera nada casual para que no se pierda detalle de lo que van sirviendo. Todo muy bien presentado y explicado por los diferentes camareros que te atienden.
translation: Once you overcome the initial objections and comparisons with other renowned restaurants of great category but let's say more conventional understand that the only protagonist of the whole evening is the food and its different and complex elaborations. Diners move on to a second term. A festival of flavors that surprises you dish after dish. The tables are lit in a non-casual way so that you don't miss out on the detail of what they are serving. All very well presented and explained by the different waiters who serve you.

body: Cuando uno va a comer a un restaurante del m√°ximo nivel, espera perfecci√≥n. M√°s trat√°ndose de Jordi Cruz, que, por ser medi√°tico, se le conoce un pel√≠n m√°s, y creo que su bandera es precisamente la perfecci√≥n, la excelencia y el cuidado de los detalles. El men√∫ es incre√≠ble, es cierto. Ya de entrada te avisan de que hay platos "fijos", que, por ser los mejor valorados, perduran en el tiempo, y otros pues m√°s arriesgados o nuevos. Todos tienen su toque, y, aunque la cocina es de vanguardia, es bastante conservadora y tradicional en sabores. De los, creo, 20 platos, el 50% emocionan, literalmente. Est√°n buen√≠simos. A destacar la anguila, la sardina y el pich√≥n. Tambi√©n la sopa de cebolla y los calamares a la romana. Lo m√°s flojito lo de comer burbujas. El tema est√° en que ha habido un par de incidencias, una completamente comprensible y otra creo que inaceptable en un men√∫ de este precio. Creo que no procede detallarlo aqu√≠ y, de hecho, no lo escribir√≠a si no fuera porque no ha habido ninguna reacci√≥n por parte de los responsables del restaurante. El a√±o pasado estuvimos en el Disfrutar, celebrando lo mismo, y, despu√©s de un peque√±o error, a los 5 minutos el responsable de sala estaba d√°ndonos explicaciones y pidiendo disculpas. Esta vez, en el Abac, que tiene una estrella m√°s, hemos comentado con el camarero lo ocurrido (un error evidente de cocina) y ah√≠ se ha quedado la incidencia. Se ha disculpado algo nervioso, pero nos hemos quedado con las ganas de conocer el origen de la incidencia. Y nos ha sorprendido, primero, que se produjera, y segundo que no hayan venido a disculparse de manera formal y a decirnos qu√© hab√≠a pasado. Salvo ese detalle, la comida ha sido espectacular y hemos disfrutado con lo que hemos comido y con el lugar. Todos han tenido un trato ejemplar, con las palabras exactas y tambi√©n han tenido un detalle teniendo en cuenta que celebr√°bamos nuestro aniversario de boda. Gracias por todo chicos y seguid trabajando duro para el 10.
translation: When you go to a restaurant of the highest standard, expect perfection. More to Jordi Cruz, who, as a media person, is known a bit more, and I think his flag is precisely perfection, excellence and care for details. The menu is amazing, it's true. At first they warn you that there are "fixed" dishes, which, being the best valued, last in time, and others as riskier or new. They all have their own touch, and although the cuisine is avant-garde, it is quite conservative and traditional in flavors. Of the, I think, 20 dishes, 50 percent thrill, literally. They look great. To highlight the eel, the sardine and the pigeon. Also onion soup and squid to the Roman. The laziest thing about eating bubbles. The point is that there have been a couple of incidents, one completely understandable and another I think unacceptable on a menu of this price. I do not think it is appropriate to detail it here and, in fact, I would not write it if it were not because there has not been any reaction from the restaurant managers. Last year we were at the Enjoy, celebrating the same thing, and, after a little mistake, at 5 minutes the room manager was giving us explanations and apologizing. This time, in the Abac, which has one more star, we have commented with the waiter what happened (an obvious cooking error) and there has remained the incidence. He has apologized somewhat nervously, but we have been left wanting to know the origin of the incidence. And we were surprised, first, that it happened, and second that they didn't come to formally apologize and tell us what had happened. Except for that detail, the food has been spectacular and we have enjoyed what we have eaten and the place. Everyone has had an exemplary deal, with the exact words and also had a detail considering we were celebrating our wedding anniversary. Thanks for all the guys and keep working hard for the 10th.

body: Pues como ya pude verificar que el restaurante estaba bien, le compr√© un bono regalo para dos persona a mi pareja. Por suerte me eligi√≥ como acompa√±ante y pude disfrutar de una nueva experiencia en el Abac. En primer lugar, cuando intentamos hacer la reserva online con el bono no pod√≠amos. Nos pusimos en contacto con el restaurante v√≠a email y nos solucionaron el problema. Aparte,el bono era de men√∫ abac y no del gran abac y actualmente solo se sirve el gran abac. Nos adaptaron el men√∫ quitando tres platos. Llegamos en coche y pudimos aparcar en el parking sin ning√∫n problema, llamando al interfono que hay en la entrada de avinguda tibidado. A la salida del parking, nos esperaba una persona que nos acompa√±√≥ a nuestra mesa. Esta vez la sala no estaba tan bien. Me gust√≥ m√°s la sala en que estuve la primera vez, que era m√°s espaciosa y creo que m√°s elegante. La comida fue igual de excelente, volviendo a destacar la sopa de cebolla, y el calamar a la romana me pareci√≥ mejor. No me apasion√≥ mucho el plato de carne. Los postres muy ricos pero ech√© en falta uno que fuese tan espl√©ndido como el oda a lo ef√≠mero. La selecci√≥n de copas del sumiller excelente, sobre todo el dulce. El servicio muy bueno, aunque puede molestar un poco el ajetreo que llevan y puede conducir a errores. En el restaurante de la Ruscalleda no percib√≠ tanto movimiento,parec√≠a m√°s tranquilo. Por suerte Jordi Cruz estaba, sab√≠a que a mi pareja le har√≠a ilusi√≥n,y pas√≥ por las mesas a saludarte y hacerse fotos a quien se lo pidiese. Muy amable. La terraza donde se toma el caf√© est√° bien, pero no supera al jard√≠n que ten√≠a el sant pau. La m√∫sica ambiente para mi gusto sobra. La segunda vez que he ido estuvo mejor porque pude compartir la experiencia. La verdad, creo que vales la pena.
translation: As I was able to verify that the restaurant was fine, I bought a gift voucher for two people from my partner. Luckily, he chose me as his companion and I was able to enjoy a new experience at the Abac. First of all, when we tried to make the online reservation with the bonus we could not. We contacted the restaurant via email and they solved the problem. Besides, the bonus was from the abac menu and not from the big abac and currently only the big abac is served. They adapted the menu by removing three plates. We arrived by car and were able to park in the car park without any problems, calling the intercom at the entrance of avinguda tibidado. At the exit of the parking, we were expected by a person who accompanied us to our table. This time the room wasn't so good. I liked more the room I was in the first time, which was more spacious and I think more elegant. The food was just as excellent, highlighting the onion soup again, and the squid √† la romana seemed better to me. I wasn't very passionate about the meat dish. The desserts were very rich but I missed one that was as splendid as the ode to the ephemeral. The selection of the sommelier's glasses is excellent, especially the sweet. The service is very good, although it can annoy a bit the hustle and bustle they carry and can lead to errors. At the restaurant of the Ruscalleda I did not perceive so much movement, it seemed quieter. Luckily Jordi Cruz was there, he knew my partner would be excited, and he walked by the tables to greet you and take pictures of whoever asked him to. Very nice. The terrace where you can enjoy your coffee is fine, but it is no better than the garden of the Saint Paul. The ambient music for my taste is plenty. The second time I went was better because I was able to share the experience. Actually, I think you're worth it.

body: Es la primera vez que vamos mi marido y yo a un restaurante de esta categor√≠a, y sin duda, repetiremos la experiencia en cuanto podamos. En primer lugar, el trato en salsa es atento y esmerado. A pesar de la situaci√≥n con el Covid-19, el ambiente fue muy agradable y relajado, acompa√±ado de una selecci√≥n de versiones de grandes √©xitos como m√∫sica ambiental que acompa√±aban a crear este ambiente.En lo referente a la comida, todo estaba exquisito. Sorprendente, tanto en las texturas y sabores encontrados en todos los platos, como en su emplatado (algunos de ellos realizados en mesa) Si bien es cierto que para gustos los colores, quiz√° alguno de los c√≥cteles (blody mary one the rock y aguas s√≥nicas de zanahoria) no fueron de mi agrado. Agradecer a Jordi Cruz que se pasara por las mesas para saludar a los comensales y charlar un poco con nosotros. Sin duda, una experiencia inolvidable.
translation: This is the first time my husband and I have ever been to a restaurant in this category, and we will certainly repeat the experience as soon as we can. First of all, the treatment in sauce is attentive and careful. Despite the situation with the Covid-19, the atmosphere was very pleasant and relaxed, accompanied by a selection of versions of great hits such as ambient music that accompanied the creation of this atmosphere.As far as food was concerned, everything was exquisite. Surprising, both in the textures and flavors found in all the dishes, as in their plastered (some of them made at table) While it is true that for tastes the colors, perhaps some of the cocktails (blody mary one the rock and sonic carrot waters) were not to my liking. To thank Jordi Cruz for coming by the tables to greet the guests and chat with us a little. Undoubtedly, an unforgettable experience.

body: La comida muy bien, me chirria que multipliquen casi por cuatro el precio en tienda de una botella de vino y que pagando 225 euros por menu tenga que pagar 5 euros por cafe y 5 euros por botellin de agua. Tampoco queda claro que pregunte si puedo usar pantalon corto y me digan que no es posible por protocolo y vea en el restaurante minimo dos personas con este atuendo...
translation: The food is very good, I would chirp that they multiply by almost four the price in store of a bottle of wine and that paying 225 euros per menu has to pay 5 euros for coffee and 5 euros for bottle of water. It is also not clear that I ask if I can wear shorts and tell me that it is not possible by protocol and see in the restaurant at least two people in this outfit...

body: Hace cinco a√±os celebramos el cumplea√±os de mi mujer y fue espectacular, fue una experiencia de mil sabores, y cinco a√±os despu√©s hemos vuelto a celebrar el cumplea√±os en el mismo restaurante, con la Peculiaridad q hace cinco a√±os era dos estrellas, y nos encant√≥, y ahora es tres estrellas .La verdad q la cena fue buen√≠sima no, lo siguiente, cada plato ten√≠a un sabor q hac√≠a q tu paladar disfrutara de ese delicioso manjar, puede parecer cursi mi comentario, pero creo q me quedo corto, y tal vez la definici√≥n de la cena es im presionante, en dos palabras, como dec√≠a aquel torero.Tambi√©n destacar el servicio, los camareros, el sommelier, y en especial Federico, q nos hicieron pasar una feliz y agradable velada, y me hicieron un barraquito especial.Y para rematar la velada, Jordi Cruz sali√≥ a saludar a los comensales, cosa q ya hizo hace cinco a√±os, todo un detalle, pues yo he ido a m√°s de 25 restaurantes michelin. Y la verdad q s√≥lo habr√°n salido a saludar a los comensales,unos siete. Todo un detalle de normalidad , proximidad y humildad.En fin un cumplea√±os feliz en may√∫sculas, espero volver como m√≠nimo de aqu√≠ cinco a√±os, y si se han inventado cuatro estrellas, seguro q Jordi la tendr√°.PD: Pasamos la noche en el hotel y tambi√©n fue brutal, lo recomiendo
translation: Five years ago we celebrated my wife's birthday and it was spectacular, it was an experience of a thousand flavors, and five years later we have celebrated the birthday again in the same restaurant, with the Peculiarity that five years ago was two stars, and we loved it, and now it is three stars .The truth that the dinner was very good not, the next thing, each dish had a flavor that made your palate enjoy that delicious delicacy, it may seem cheesy my comment, but I think I fall short, and maybe the definition of dinner is impressing, in two words, as said that torero.Also highlight the service, the waiters, the sommelier And especially Federico, who made us spend a happy and pleasant evening, and made me a special little neighborhood.And to end the evening, Jordi Cruz went out to greet the diners, which he did five years ago, quite a detail, since I have gone to more than 25 Michelin restaurants. And the truth is, they've only gone out to greet the diners, about seven. A detail of normality, proximity and humility.Finally a happy birthday in capital letters, I hope to return at least five years from here, and if four stars have been invented, sure Jordi will have it.PD: We spent the night at the hotel and it was brutal too, I recommend it

body: Era nuestra tercera visita a este afamado restaurante ( la primera desde que ostenta la tercera estrella ) y la verdad es que la sensaci√≥n final fue la misma que en las otras dos ocasiones; disfrutamos de la creatividad y perfecta t√©cnica culinaria de Jordi Cruz, as√≠ como del espect√°culo de la puesta en escena de todos los pases, aunque a nosotros particularmente nos sigue faltando algo para la excelencia absoluta en comparaci√≥n con otros restaurantes de su mismo nivel. Obviamente se trata de una percepci√≥n relacionada con nuestros gustos personales y sin dejar de reconocer que todos los platos del men√∫ estuvieron notables, pero en nuestro caso coincidimos en que fueron pocos ( una cuarta parte) los que realmente nos acabaron cautivando de sobremanera como para calificarlos de excelentes. A nuestro parecer los platos m√°s destacables fueron: el pan frito de anguila a la brasa con wasabi fresco y alioli de anguila ahumada ; el cl√°sico Bloody Mary on the rocks; la mantequilla de avellana montada con finas cortezas de pan y caviar; el jugo de cebolla de Figueres y huevo de pollita ( una original versi√≥n de la sopa de cebolla tradicional ); y de los postres: las texturas de yogur con crujiente de galletas y helado de violetas bajo una escarcha de flores secas y disecadas; adem√°s de una menci√≥n especial al sensacional pan de elaboraci√≥n propia. Justo es rese√±ar el excelente trato recibido por parte de un servicio algo m√°s cercano y jovial en comparaci√≥n con el perfil excesivamente ‚Äúencorsetado‚Äù y distante de anteriores ocasiones. Personalmente, seguimos echando en falta el detalle de que el chef se pase por las mesas para recibir el feedback de los comensales.
translation: It was our third visit to this famous restaurant ( the first since it has been the third star ) and the truth is that the final sensation was the same as on the other two occasions; We enjoy the creativity and perfect culinary technique of Jordi Cruz, as well as the spectacle of the staging of all the countries, although we particularly still lack something for absolute excellence compared to other restaurants of the same level. Obviously this is a perception related to our personal tastes and while acknowledging that all the dishes on the menu were remarkable, but in our case we agreed that few (a quarter) really captivated us enough to qualify them as excellent. In our opinion the most remarkable dishes were: grilled eel fried bread with fresh wasabi and smoked eel aioli; the classic Bloody Mary on the rocks; hazelnut butter assembled with fine bread crusts and caviar; Figueres onion juice and chick egg ( an original version of traditional onion soup ); and desserts: the textures of yogurt with crunchy biscuits and violet ice cream under a frost of dried and dried flowers; in addition to a special mention to the sensational bread of own elaboration. It's fair to review the excellent treatment received by a somewhat closer and more jovial service compared to the overly "corseted" and distant profile of previous occasions. Personally, we still miss the detail of the chef walking around the tables to receive feedback from the guests.

body: Una experiencia totalmente recomendable. Servicio inmejorable, tempos de 10 y sobretodo una comida de 3 estrellas michelin. Con todo el tema del covid solo tienen un menu y se toma entero en sala. Mi plato favorito el de cebolla de figueres. 10/10
translation: A totally recommended experience. Unbeatable service, 10 tempos and above all a 3 Michelin star meal. With all the covid theme they only have one menu and it is taken whole in room. My favorite dish is figueres onion. 10/10

body: Es dificil dar una opini√≥n en un restaurante con tres estrellas Michelin. Me gustar√≠a encontrar un pero. Peroooo. No lo hay. Solo puedo decir felicidades al se√±or Jordi Cruz y a todo su equipo. Tanto en la cocina como en la sala. Solo me gustar√≠a hacer un comentario para que se vea que aparte de la profesionalidad de Jordi Cruz. Esta el lado humano. Fui a celebrar mi aniversario de boda. Hable con la relaciones publicas para pedirle que si podia salir a saludar a mi mujer que es una gran fan y seguidora de Jordi Cruz. Este accedi√≥ sin ning√∫n reparo. Se hizo fotos con nosotros. Y al final nos sorprendio con un pastelito y una vela para que la celebraci√≥n fuese completa. Se√±ores esto no tiene precio. Much√≠simas gracias al Abac y a Jordi Cruz. Estos detalles son los que hacen aun mas grandes a los profesionales. Y este ya es grande por si. Felicidades
translation: It's hard to give an opinion at a three-Michelin-starred restaurant. I'd like to find a dog. But. There isn't. I can only say congratulations to Mr. Jordi Cruz and his entire team. Both in the kitchen and in the living room. I would just like to make a comment to make it look that apart from the professionalism of Jordi Cruz. There's the human side. I went to celebrate my wedding anniversary. I spoke to the public relations to ask him if I could go out and say hello to my wife who is a big fan and follower of Jordi Cruz. This one agreed without any qualms. He took pictures with us. And in the end we were surprised with a small cake and a candle to make the celebration complete. Gentlemen, this is priceless. Thank you very much to Abac and Jordi Cruz. These details are what make professionals even bigger. And this one's already big in case. Congratulations

body: Magn√≠fico restaurante donde disfrutamos de su men√∫ degustaci√≥n: empezando por el aperitivo on the rocks, y pasando por las ricas ostras, las magn√≠ficas navajas, etc., hasta llegar al magn√≠fico colom√≠. Colof√≥n con los postres y petit fours.
translation: A superb restaurant where you can enjoy the tasting menu: starting with the aperitif on the rocks, passing by the rich oysters, the magnificent razors, etc., until you reach the magnificent colom√≠. The desserts and the petit fours are the order of the day.

body:
Un aut√©ntico espect√°culo. No recuerdo ni un solo plato que no fuese buen√≠simo. La sopa de cebolla, realmente incre√≠ble. Los cocktails muy sorprendentes y ricos. El maridaje muy bien seleccionado, probando hasta 7 vinos diferentes. 

El servicio un 10, todo encantandores, atentos y amables.
translation: A real show. I don't remember a single dish that wasn't great. The onion soup, really amazing. The very surprising and rich cocktails. Pairing very well selected, tasting up to 7 different wines.The service a 10, all charming, attentive and friendly.

body: Es la segunda vez que voy y no volver√©.Le he dado otra oportunidad y fatal de nuevo. Pagar 1000 euros para una comida de 3 y que te obliguen a hacer la sobremesa a las 16h en la terraza a 32 grados no tiene nombre. Ni un ventilador.... a pleno sol cuando el restaurante dentro estaba vac√≠o.Los postres deshechos del calor, los vinos y cavas poco fr√≠os, Nada que ver con otros que he estado: Celler de can Roca, Akelarre, Carme Ruscalleda, etc.... no le llega a la suela del zapato a ninguno de tres estrellas m√°s.
translation: It's the second time I've gone and I won't come back. I've given it another chance and fatal again. Paying 1000 euros for a 3-course meal and being forced to make a table at 4 pm on the terrace at 32 degrees has no name. Not a fan.... in full sun when the restaurant inside was empty.Desserts undone from the heat, wines and cava little cold, Nothing to do with others I have been: Celler de can Roca, Akelarre, Carme Ruscalleda, etc.... does not reach the sole of the shoe to any of three more stars.

body: Cuando vas a un 3 estrellas, y si has sido a alguno vas con unas expectativas minimas y a nivel de comida... se ha superado con creces, bravo por ello!!Dicho esto el servicio no ha estado a la altura:- Explicaci√≥n de platos expr√©s, algunas veces dejando elementos a comer sin explicaci√≥n alguna. Habia veces que se hacia dif√≠cil entender al camarero por hablar tan rapido y tan nervioso.Creemos que los camaremos no deben ser robotse ir con prisas... deben comunicar bien.(En otras mesas se hizo muuucho mejor y nos enteramos de cosas gracias a los de al lado.)- Prisas en servir e imposibilidad de ir al ba√±o porque se estaba preparando un plato- El somelier habia prometido 4 vinos distintos y solo trajo 2... sin volver a pasar (nada nuevo en pescados o postres)- Teniamos 100‚Ç¨ + a gastar y en ningun momento pudimos ver carta de vinos y bebidas para tener una idea de lo que habia disponible y pedir consejo.- Olvido de un caf√© despu√©s de esperar bastante para el ultimo plato de postre.- Sugerimos un trato m√°s de tu a tu en las mesas, con un camarero referente, i.e : me llamo X ysi necesitan algo... pidan por mi. Al final te sirve tanta gente diferente que resulta extra√±o.Todo lo decimos de forma constructiva,tan buena comida debe ir bien acompa√±ada y explicada. Espero que todo esto se mejore en futuro pr√≥ximo para el bien de los comensales y el restaurante.
translation: When you go to a 3 star, and if you have been to any you go with a minimum expectations and at the level of food... it has been far surpassed, bravo for it!!That said the service has not been up to scratch:- Explanation of express dishes, sometimes leaving elements to eat without explanation. There were times when it became difficult to understand the waiter for speaking so fast and so nervous.We believe that we will love them should not be robots go with haste... they should communicate well.(At other tables it became much better and we learned about things thanks to those next door.)- Rushing to serve and unable to go to the bathroom because a dish was being prepared- The somelier had promised 4 different wines and only brought 2... without happening again (nothing new in fish or desserts)- We had 100‚Ç¨ + to spend and at no time could we see wine and drink list to have an idea of I forgot a coffee after waiting long for the last dish of dessert.- We suggest a treatment more of you to your table, with a waiter reference, i.e: My name is X and if you need anything... ask for me. In the end it serves you so many different people that it is strange.Everything we say constructively, so good food should be well accompanied and explained. I hope all this will be improved in the near future for the good of the diners and the restaurant.

body: Experiencia inolvidable, con unos platos espectaculares en todos los aspectos. El personal super amable y atento. La presentaci√≥n de los vinos en el maridaje muy profesional pues no solo te trae el vino si no que te introduce en la historia del origen de cada bodega. Todo un espect√°culo para el paladar. Un poco enturbiado por el COVID-19 ya que no pudimos hacer el "tour" por las cocinas y la terraza pero en la sala todo perfecto. Con ganas de repetir cuando actualicen la carta!
translation: Unforgettable experience, with spectacular dishes in all aspects. The staff is very friendly and attentive. The presentation of the wines in the pairing very professional because not only brings you the wine but also introduces you to the history of the origin of each winery. A show for the palate. A bit muddied by COVID-19 as we couldn't do the "tour" of the kitchens and terrace but in the room everything perfect. Eager to repeat when you update the letter!

body: Degustar los platos en las diferentes estancias del restaurante es una verdadera pasada. El men√∫ es extenso, variado y su presentaci√≥n es muy original. Fue una experiencia que vale la pena repetir de vez en cuando para probar los men√∫s actualizados.
translation: Tasting the dishes in the different rooms of the restaurant is a real success. The menu is extensive, varied and very original. It was an experience worth repeating from time to time to test the updated menus.

body: En mi modesta opini√≥n, la visita ha tenido sus mas y sus menos. Comienzo por los √∫ltimos desde el respeto y con √°nimo constructivo. He pasado frio, la mesa estaba situada bajo un chorro de aire g√©lido y quiz√°s sea posoble controlar este punto. La m√∫sica ambiental , creo que sobra, especialmente si es de poca monta ( versiones de canciones muy conocidas ) y se oye a un volumen excesivo. El servicio lo consideramos cort√©s pero algo frio y rob√≥tico: la explicaci√≥n de los platos es un recitado a toda velocidad que se repite sin cambiar ni una palabra entre las mesas cercanas,includas las bromas ( Amazon Prime...)El men√∫, original sin duda , es variado, tecnico y muy rico, pero no nos ha maravillado, aunque ha habido platos y bebidas excelentes. Destacamos los c√≥cteles y el extraordinario pichon, asi como el pan artesano y la gamba roja. Postres de calidad.En conjunto, un ocho 8 sobre 10. En cuanto a la relaci√≥n calidad precio, in maridaje y con vinos por copas, la cuenta asciende a 500 euros para dos personas.
translation: In my modest opinion, the visit has had its more and less. I start with the last ones with respect and in a constructive spirit. I've been cold, the table was under a jet of frigid air and it may be possible to control this point. Ambient music, I think, is plenty, especially if it's small-time ( versions of well-known songs ) and you hear it at an excessive volume. The service we consider courteous but somewhat cold and robotic: the explanation of the dishes is a full-speed recitation that repeats itself without changing a word between the nearby tables, including the jokes ( Amazon Prime...)The menu, original no doubt, is varied, technical and very rich, but we have not marveled, although there have been excellent dishes and drinks. Cocktails and the extraordinary pichon, as well as artisan bread and red shrimp, stand out. Quality desserts.Overall, an 8 out of 10. In terms of value for money, without pairing and with wines by the glass, the bill is 500 euros for two people.

body: Simplemente extraodinaria experiencia. Celebrando mi cumplea√±os con mi mujer Carol. Platos exquisitos, sofisticados, impecable ejecucion, presentacion perfecta.
translation: Just extraordinary experience. Celebrating my birthday with my wife Carol. Exquisite dishes, sophisticated, impeccable execution, perfect presentation.

body: Visitamos el restaurante en Febrero y la verdad nos preocupaba un poco el pasar hambre. Al final, aunque se trate de platos peque√±os, el hecho de que sean tantos te satisface completamente. Es una experiencia para repetir cada cierto tiempo e ir probando diferentes men√∫s a medida que los actualizan.Como punto negativo el excesivo precio de los caf√©s y el agua. Deber√≠an ser precios m√°s econ√≥micos, en particular el agua.El precio de los vinos de todo, tienen una carta de vinos que recuerda a la viejas gu√≠as de tel√©fonos jajajaj es enorme.
translation: We visited the restaurant in February and the truth we were a bit worried about going hungry. In the end, even if they are small dishes, the fact that there are so many satisfies you completely. It's an experience to repeat every once in a while and try out different menus as they update them.The negative point is the excessive price of coffee and water. They should be cheaper prices, particularly water.The price of wines everywhere, they have a wine list reminiscent of old phone guides hahahahaha is huge.

body: La primera idea con la que una persona tiene que acudir a este restaurante es muy simple, hay que olvidar todo lo que cree uno saber sobre gastronom√≠a. Los sabores y las presentaciones son de un nivel superior, y las sensaciones que experimentan las papilas gustativas son nuevas, uno llega virgen a este lugar, y la primera vez dejara un recuerdo imborrable, el cual es la expresi√≥n de la m√°s alta pasi√≥n por la buena cocina. A la hora de venir aqu√≠, no aconsejo medias tintas hay que disfrutar al 100% esta experiencia y eso solamente se puede hacer con el men√∫ Gran ABaC.No obstante, un restaurante que maneja este tipo de platos, con una complejidad t√©cnica muy elevada y que por lo tanto conlleva un precio de men√∫ tambi√©n alto debe de cumplir con unas exigencias en el servicio que no se vieron satisfechas, y que deben de ser remarcadas para que no sucedan en otras ocasiones a futuros comensales:1. El periodo de espera en la terraza, con los tres primeros platos se hace demasiado largo. Adem√°s, el personal de all√≠ no mostr√≥ amabilidad ninguna. Quiz√°s servir alg√∫n plato m√°s en la terraza o aumentar las raciones de los de esta zona pueda amenizar el tiempo de espera.2. Al igual que el tiempo de espera en la terraza es muy largo, el periodo en el cual se est√° en la cocina es muy corto. Se entiende que la cocina es un espacio de trabajo y que los comensales no pueden permanecer all√≠ mucho tiempo, pero va todo tan r√°pido que los platos de all√≠ se comen con mucha prisa y no los puedes disfrutar completamente.3. En sala, se les olvid√≥ servir uno de los platos del men√∫ el "Bloody Mary on the rocks". Si bien es cierto que luego compensaron no incluyendo el agua en la cuenta. Espero que estos tres puntos sirvan para llevar a la perfecci√≥n un restaurante el cual merece la pena visitar sin lugar a dudas para disfrutar de una experiencia gastron√≥mica que seguro, no defraudar√°.
translation: The first idea that a person has to go to this restaurant is very simple, you have to forget everything you think you know about gastronomy. The flavors and presentations are of a higher level, and the sensations that experience the taste buds are new, one arrives virgin to this place, and the first time will leave an indelible memory, which is the expression of the highest passion for good cuisine. When coming here, I don't advise half-baked, you have to enjoy this experience 100% and that can only be done with the Gran ABaC menu.However, a restaurant that handles this type of dishes, with a very high technical complexity and that therefore carries a high menu price must meet some requirements in the service that were not satisfied, and that must be highlighted so that they do not happen in other occasions to future diners:1. The waiting period on the terrace, with the first three dishes becomes too long. Moreover, the staff there did not show any kindness. Perhaps serving some more dishes on the terrace or increasing the portions of those in this area can liven up the waiting time.2. Just as the waiting time on the terrace is very long, the period in which you are in the kitchen is very short. It is understood that the kitchen is a working space and that the guests cannot stay there for long, but it goes so fast that the dishes there are eaten in a hurry and you cannot enjoy them completely.3. In the dining room, they forgot to serve one of the dishes on the menu "Bloody Mary on the rocks". While it is true that they later compensated by not including the water in the account. I hope that these three points will serve to bring to perfection a restaurant which is worth visiting without a doubt to enjoy a gastronomic experience that will not disappoint.

body: Genial! Fui con mi pareja para almorzar el men√∫ degustaci√≥n. Tanto la comida como el servicio de restaurante de 3 estrellas....el local est√° bien decorado. Una pasada entrar a la cocina a verla y probar varios platos en ella.
translation: Great! I went with my partner for lunch on the tasting menu. Both the food and the 3-star restaurant service...the place is well decorated. One day you enter the kitchen to see it and try several dishes in it.

body: Restaurante con elegancia y un par de menus degustacion. Hicimos el gran abanc y tranquilos que quedais servidos, bebidas aparte. El servicio es bueno y las instalaciones impecables. Hay que provar-lo como todo.
translation: Restaurant with elegance and a couple of tasting menus. We made the great bank and quiet that you were served, drinks apart. The service is good and the facilities impeccable. We have to prove it like everything.

body: Fue una gran experiencia que nos encantar√≠a repetir. Pr√°cticamente 4h que transcurren entre la terraza, la cocina y el sal√≥n principal. En las dos primeras estancias se realiza el aperitivo. LO MEJOR:- Un servicio excelente. Los camareros son todos muy amables, cercanos y dispuestos.- Calidad de la comida un 11. - Originalidad de los platos que, a pesar de ser ‚Äúcl√°sicos‚Äù en su esencia, tienen todos un toque que los hace especiales.- Jordi Cruz estaba en la cocina y nos encant√≥ el trato cercano y sobre todo lo currante que se le ve√≠a por ser un S√°bado. Nos dijo que un buen chef nunca debe dejar su cocina.LO PEOR:- Al llegar no hab√≠a nadie en la recepci√≥n y nos sentimos un poco perdidos.- Cuando conseguimos entrar, nos sentaron en la terraza pero no nos explicaron nada ni nos ofrecieron nada de beber, y lo mismo, nos sentimos perdidos o poco guiados por ser una experiencia culinaria.
translation: It was a great experience that we would love to repeat. Practically 4h between the terrace, the kitchen and the main lounge. In the first two rooms, an aperitif is served. THE BEST:- Excellent service. The waiters are all very friendly, close and willing.- Quality of the food a 11. - Originality of the dishes that, despite being "classic" in their essence, all have a touch that makes them special.- Jordi Cruz was in the kitchen and we loved the close treatment and especially how current he looked to be a Saturday. He told us that a good chef should never leave his kitchen.THE WORST:- When we arrived there was no one at the reception and we felt a little lost.- When we got in, we were seated on the terrace but they did not explain anything or offer us anything to drink, and the same, we felt lost or little guided by being a culinary experience.

body:
Ambiente   experiencia muy agradable y divertida.
Platos muy elaborados y con escaso producto s√≥lido.
Este tipo de establecimiento, por la rigidez de los men√∫s que ofertan, no permiten una visita muy frecuente. Una pena....!
translation: Ambience ¬† very pleasant and fun experience.Very elaborate dishes with little solid product.This type of establishment, due to the rigidity of the menus offered, do not allow a very frequent visit. A pity....!

body: No est√° a la altura de lo que a un tres estrellas se le presupone.De los aproximadamente 20 platos que nos sirvieron, varios nos decepcionaron (infusi√≥n de quesos, brandada de bacalao, gamba con avellanas...) y tan s√≥lo dos (pan frito de anguila y calabaza asada) nos dejaron realmente impresionados. Mejora en los postres, especialmente en las nubes negras con vainilla.En resumen, la mayor√≠a de los platos estaban buenos salvo alguna excepci√≥n, pero pr√°cticamente ninguno justifica el cartel que el restaurante tiene, ni por supuesto la cuenta final, 550‚Ç¨ por dos comensales.Tenemos claro que no volveremos.
translation: It's not up to what a three-star restaurant is supposed to. Of the approximately 20 dishes served, several disappointed us (infusion of cheese, cod brandy, prawn with hazelnuts...) and just two (fried eel bread and roasted pumpkin) left us really impressed. Improvement in desserts, especially in black clouds with vanilla.In short, most dishes were good except for some exception, but practically none justify the sign that the restaurant has, nor of course the final bill, 550‚Ç¨ for two diners.We are clear that we will not return.

body: Todo es perfecto desde el primer momento.La comida empieza en un jard√≠n interior, un espacio muy agradable. Sigue en la cocina y termina en el comedor.Las mesas son amplias y muy c√≥modas.El personal de servicio es elegantemente atento y eficiente, lo que ayuda a que todo resulte muy agradable.Finalmente, los platos son excelentes. En esto no hay matiz.En conjunto, acaba siendo una experiencia extraordinaria.
translation: Everything is perfect from the start.The food starts in an interior garden, a very pleasant space. Stay in the kitchen and end up in the dining room.The tables are spacious and very comfortable.The service staff is elegantly attentive and efficient, which helps make everything very pleasant.Finally, the dishes are excellent. In this there is no nuance. Overall, it ends up being an extraordinary experience.

body: Comida buen√≠sima y atenci√≥n inmejorable. No le doy la m√°xima puntuaci√≥n porque creo que es excesivo pagar 7 euros por un t√© y 6 por un caf√© cuando estas pagando m√°s de 200 euros por persona en un men√∫ degustaci√≥n.
translation: Excellent food and unbeatable attention. I don't give him the maximum score because I think it's excessive to pay 7 euros for a tea and 6 for a coffee when you're paying more than 200 euros per person on a tasting menu.

body: Experiencia familiar inolvidable celebrando un cumplea√±os muy especial. Sorpresa muy positiva en cada uno de los platos del men√∫. Servicio excelente. Recomendable la experiencia con maridaje. Caro pero..un d√≠a es un d√≠a!
translation: Unforgettable family experience celebrating a very special birthday. Very positive surprise in each of the dishes on the menu. Excellent service. We recommend the experience with pairing. Expensive but... a day is a day!

body: Y as√≠ es. Todo casi perfecto. Un servicio casi a la altura de las tres estrellas que lo alumbran. Un carrusel de sensaciones en boca mas que interesante. Un entorno digno de su categor√≠a. Pero una vez m√°s los detalles en el servicio. Con algunos camareros en la entrada atropellados. M√°s de una cara de circunstancia. Un mecanismo m√°s que evidente y una comida que estando a una altura gal√°ctica, perd√≠a brillo por la falta de entusiasmo.Y estoy a vueltas con lo que √∫ltimamente noto en algunos *** .Falta alegria, sinfon√≠a, brillo en el conjunto. Echo en falta las ganas del servicio porque te agraden las cosas. Los platos en su excelencia se han vuelto mec√°nicos. El te salude el Chef no sea tan ‚ÄúParipe‚Äù. Entendiendo en este caso la doble tarea de astro medi√°tico y chef que arrastra el simp√°tico de Jordi.Con todo esto, en mi primera visita a Abac, felicito a Jordi y a todo el equipo por el trabajo que hacen y por deleitarnos con su propuesta. Pero un poquito m√°s de rock and roll en la cocina y sinfon√≠a alegre en sala..... Ser√≠a perfecto!
translation: And so it is. Everything almost perfect. The service is almost up to the three stars that light it up. A carousel of sensations in the mouth more than interesting. An environment worthy of its category. But once again the details in the service. With some waiters at the entrance run over. More than one face of circumstance. A mechanism more than evident and a food that being at a galactic height, lost brightness due to lack of enthusiasm.And I'm back with what lately I notice in some *** .Lack of joy, symphony, brightness in the whole. I miss the desire for service because you like things. The dishes in their excellence have become mechanical. The Chef greets you not so "Paripe". Understanding in this case the double task of media star and chef that carries the sympathetic Jordi.With all this, on my first visit to Abac, I congratulate Jordi and the whole team for the work they do and for delighting us with their proposal. But a little more rock and roll in the kitchen and merry symphony in the living room..... It would be perfect!

body: Agradable experiencia , desde la llegada en el coche en la q nos esperaban en el parking . Donde nos acompa√±aron hasta el la terraza para disfrutar de la primera parte de la experiencia. En general todo fue muy bien el servicio la comida el local. Nos dieron fant√°stico soporte t√©cnico culinario aclarando las dudas. Disfrutamos del segundo men√∫ de 225‚Ç¨ principalmente basado en pescado y marisco. Los postres s√∫per creativos con una presentaci√≥n s√∫per bonita.
translation: Pleasant experience , from the arrival in the car in which we were expected in the parking lot . Where they accompanied us to the terrace to enjoy the first part of the experience. Overall everything went very well the service and food the local. They gave us fantastic culinary technical support clarifying the doubts. We enjoyed the second menu of 225‚Ç¨ mainly based on fish and seafood. The super creative desserts with a super nice presentation.

body: Es un tres estrellas Michelin y eso se respira por todos los rincones pero con detalles diferentes a los otros triestrellados que conozco y que me parece original y a resaltar, primero esa pre cena unos aperitivos geniales en la terraza, como un paso previo al show, luego el recorrido por la cocina verlos en acci√≥n, tan ordenado, tan limpio, tanto personal, tuvimos la suerte de que estuviese Jordi y verlo trabajar a √©l fue un s√∫per plus, luego la vajilla y el ambiente y un personal extremadamente joven y profesional, maravilloso ( nuestro camarero ten√≠a 20 a√±os y tan profesional, que maravilla) y l√≥gicamente esa sucesi√≥n de platos exquisitos y m√°gicos. Gracias Jordi. Esfuerzo, creatividad y mucho trabajo detr√°s de cada detalle
translation: It is a three Michelin stars and that is breathed in all the corners but with different details to the other tristars that I know and that I find original and to highlight, first that pre dinner some great snacks on the terrace, as a step before the show, then the tour of the kitchen see them in action, so tidy, so clean, so much staff, we were lucky that Jordi was there and watching him work to him was a super plus, then the crockery and the atmosphere and an extremely young and professional staff, wonderful (our waiter was 20 years old and so professional, that he wonders) and logically that succession of exquisite and magical dishes . Thanks, Jordi. Effort, creativity and a lot of work behind every detail

body: Hemos ido comer con mi marido y mi hijo, desde que llegas al restaurante sabes que va a ser toda una experiencia y desde luego no defrauda. El local, la cocina, el trato de los camareros, la profesionalidad del somelier... y hemos tenido la suerte de conocer al maestro Jordi Cruz!Nos hemos dejado asesorar y hemos escogido el menu Abac con su maridage.Ha cumplido todas nuestras expectativas y m√°s!Gracias Jordi Cruz y gracias a todo tu equipo a sido FANT√ÅSTICO!
translation: We've been eating with my husband and son, since you arrived at the restaurant you know it's going to be a whole experience and certainly not disappoint. The restaurant, the cuisine, the treatment of the waiters, the professionalism of the somelier... and we were lucky enough to meet the maestro Jordi Cruz!We have been advised and we have chosen the menu Abac with his maridage.He has fulfilled all our expectations and more!Thanks Jordi Cruz and thanks to all your team has been FANTASTIC!

body: Servicio y local excelentes, pero esperaba algo mas en la calidad de los platos y producto para ser tres estrellas. Algunos geniales pero otros muy normalitos, puedes comer ese producto en muchos otros sitios. Con maridaje 560e dos personas es muy excesivo. Una vez y no mas. Maridaje prescindible seguro.
translation: Excellent service and local, but I expected something more in the quality of the dishes and product to be three stars. Some great but some very normal, you can eat that product in many other places. With pairing 560e two people is very excessive. Once and no more. Safe dispensable pairing.

body: El domingo 19-01-2020 fuimos a probar el men√∫ Abac (195),con la ingrata sorpresa de no cumplir nuestras expectativas. Los aperitivos en la terraza muy flojos, una coca de hierbas con anchoa excesivamente salada (aunque estaba con infusi√≥n de cecina curada para rebajarlo) y una chip de cecina bastante sosa al paladar. El paso por cocina ninguna queja a nivel culinario, todo muy conseguido, espectacular. Una vez estuvimos en sala todo iba fenomenal hasta llegar a la Parpatana, la cual empez√≥ a crear sombras en un men√∫ irreprochable desde la fase de la cocina, pensamos que hab√≠a sido un peque√±o desliz, pero a continuaci√≥n nos encontramos con un pich√≥n con un dudoso punto de cocci√≥n, y servido en escabeche i romesco de remolacha nada armonioso desde nuestro paladar. Finalmente llegamos a los postres, y es aqu√≠ donde llega la gran decepci√≥n, ni uno se salvaba lo m√°s m√≠nimo, sin sorprender en boca, muy pero que muy flojos, insulsos, sin alma. Otra pincelada en contra, es el tramo de espera en la terraza para dar paso a la cocina, ya que en nuestro caso particular estuvimos 45 minutos, observando como gente que hab√≠a llegado despu√©s que nosotros entraba en cocina antes. Inmediatamente despu√©s de nuestra queja el jefe de sala de forma muy correcta se disculp√≥ y nos coment√≥ que nos har√≠a alguna peque√±a compensaci√≥n, palabras que se las llev√≥ el viento, sin ning√∫n gesto previo visible. Finalmente ya sabemos que no es obligatorio, pero siempre hace gracia que en alg√∫n momento aparezca el chef, cosa que siempre nos ha pasado en otros restaurantes de este nivel, pues aqu√≠ nada de nada, brill√≥ por su ausencia. Conclusi√≥n: El chef, Jordi Cruz ya tiene demasiadas cosas, demasido Masterchef, etc. "Por eso no pudo estar por sus comensales."
translation: On Sunday 19-01-2020 we went to try the menu Abac (195), with the unwelcome surprise of not meeting our expectations. The very lazy terrace appetizers, a herb coke with excessively salty anchovy (though it was with infusion of cured cecina to bring it down) and a rather bland cecina chip to the palate. The step by cooking no complaints at culinary level, all very accomplished, spectacular. Once we were in the dining room everything was phenomenal until we arrived at the Parpatana, which began to create shadows in an irreproachable menu from the stage of the kitchen, we thought it had been a small slip, but then we found a pigeon with a dubious cooking point, and served in pickle i romesco of beet nothing harmonious from our palate. Finally we arrive at desserts, and this is where the great disappointment comes, not one was saved the slightest, without surprising in mouth, very but very lazy, insulted, soulless. Another brushstroke against it is the waiting stretch on the terrace to make way for the kitchen, since in our particular case we were 45 minutes, watching as people who had arrived after we entered the kitchen before. Immediately after our complaint the head of room very correctly apologized and told us that he would make us some small compensation, words that were taken by the wind, without any visible previous gesture. Finally we know that it is not mandatory, but it is always funny that at some point the chef appears, something that has always happened to us in other restaurants of this level, because here nothing of anything, shone by its absence. Conclusion: The chef, Jordi Cruz already has too much stuff, too much Masterchef, etc. "That's why he couldn't be around his diners."

body: El pasado lunes 20 de Enero celebramos el 75 cumplea√±os de mi madre cenando en √Äbac. √âramos un grupo de nueve. Al llegar, sin siquiera preguntar si quer√≠amos tomar algo, nos sirvieron el primer plato. En seguida ped√≠ al camarero la carta de vinos. La trajo. Nos sirvieron el segundo plato. Le dije al camarero que quer√≠amos pedir el vino. Llam√≥ por fin al somelier, y le ped√≠ el vino. Pero cuando nos sirvieron el tercer plato, todav√≠a con un vaso de agua en la mesa, le dije al camarero que hasta que no llegaran los vinos no seguir√≠amos comiendo. Y as√≠ estuvimos un buen rato, sentados con el plato delante, esperando los vinos.Con el postre pas√≥ exactamente lo mismo. A mi hermana y a mi nos retiraron los platos a medias, estando sentados en la mesa, simplemente haciendo un descanso.Tambi√©n, antes de sentarnos en la mesa, preguntamos a la chica que nos atendi√≥ si pod√≠amos ver la cocina. Nos dijo que no, que pod√≠amos verla al final de la cena. Una vez sentados, me qued√© pensando y pregunt√© de nuevo al camarero que nos atend√≠a. La respuesta fue la misma. Me pregunto, qui√©n tiene inter√©s en ver una cocina vac√≠a y sin cocineros trabajando?He estado en el Celler de Can Roca, Mugaritz, Etxebarri, Tickets, Miramar, Aponiente, Diverxo, entre otros restaurantes de la Gu√≠a Michel√≠n. En Abac fue la primera vez que me serv√≠an un plato sin haber pedido antes la bebida. La primera vez que me sirven con prisa.
