From there we are taken to the salon where the magnificent tasting of 14 dishes with fusion of flavors, beautiful designs and great elaborations begins, a couple of them did not like me, but most of them remained indelible in my palate, as a suggestion should add more meat and less fish / seafood for greater balance Sea / Earth. Finally come the desserts, 3 incredible dishes, each with care, passion and dedication by Chef Victor (Mayor Master Chef 6), who kindly came to our table to greet us and take a photo, which we thank him. To finish the fantastic evening we take to the terrace to taste a variety of sensational sweets, fun, impeccable touches and wonderful presentation, accompanied by an infusion with aroma and flavor.I thank the dedication, professionalism, passion for your work and kindness to our waiter of the room: John Paul, at all times attentive, taking care of the details and explaining the dishes with complete ease in an effective, clear, correct way, which was good to hear. Fantastic cooking rhythm. Perfect place to enjoy a Michelin star dining experience

body: Fuimos mi marido y yo a vivir la experiencia y sin lugar a dudas, fue una aut√©ntica maravilla. Lugar encantador, maridado con excelentes vinos y un viaje por las ra√≠ces de una tierra con tradici√≥n y sabidur√≠a en sus platos. Delicia gastron√≥mica.Echamos de menos la presencia del chef durante la cena.
translation: It was my husband and I who lived the experience and without a doubt, it was a real wonder. Charming place, paired with excellent wines and a trip through the roots of a land with tradition and wisdom in its dishes. Gastronomic delight. We miss the presence of the chef during dinner.

body: Este Mi√©rcoles tuvimos la satisfacci√≥n de disfrutar de la experiencia Abac, un lugar magnifico cuando entras te viene a recibir al parquin subterr√°neo del restaurante que es muy amplio. Cuando llegas a la planta superior donde se encuentra el comedor no parece que est√©s en un restaurante de ciudad el comedor esta rodeado de un jard√≠n muy agradableInicias un periplo gastron√≥mico en la terraza donde te ogrece unos aperitivos donde los mismos cocineros lo cocinan y te lo sirven al momento exquisitos, despu√©s siguiendo el recorrido entramos en la cocina donde podemos disfutar de ese laboratorio gastron√≥mico donde se elaboran esas exquisiteces, all√≠ nos deleitan con un par mas de aperitivos de un bocado extraordinarios,nuestro periplo finaliza en una espectacular sala vidriada que te permite disfrutar del jardin, sin ningun tipo de distrsion acustica dando una sensacion de paz muy agradable.Iniciamos asi un menu llamado gran Abac sensacional lleno de sabor y muchos matices, buenas presentaciones y originales con un ritmo de servicio adecuado, la somelieria inpecable con unos caldos muy adecuados a cada plato y una presentacion de los vinos soberbiaEl final , los postres esqtraordinarios y divertidos con el postre del globo una idea diferente y devertidaEn fin una belada magnifica dificil de olvidar, un precio correcto par el nivel gastronomico y de servicio unos de los restaurantes de tres estrellas mas baratos del pais, solo anlizando el menu degustacion..
translation: This Wednesday we had the satisfaction of enjoying the Abac experience, a magnificent place when you enter comes to welcome you to the underground park of the restaurant that is very spacious. When you get to the upper floor where the dining room is located you don't seem to be in a city restaurant the dining room is surrounded by a very pleasant garden. You start a gastronomic journey on the terrace where you can enjoy some snacks where the same cooks cook it and serve it at the moment exquisite, then following the tour we enter the kitchen where we can enjoy that gastronomic laboratory where those delicacies are made, there we delight with a couple more extraordinary snacks of a bite, our journey ends in a spectacular glazed room that allows you to enjoy the garden, without any kind of distraction accustica a very pleasant sensation of peace.We started a menu called great Abac sensational full of flavor and many nuances, good presentations and originals with a proper rhythm of service, the inpeccable somelieria with very suitable broths to each dish and a presentation of the superb winesThe end, the desserts extraordinary and fun with the dessert of the globe a different and fun ideaIn short a magnificent beauty difficult to forget, a correct price for the level of gastronomy and service one of the cheapest three star restaurants in the country, only analyzing the menu tasting..

body: Tenia muchas expectativas respecto de esta cena, ninguna fue satisfecha.El servicio parec√≠a casi no importar, rob√≥tico, sin personalidad.El restaurant tiene una decoraci√≥n elegante y sobria, creo lo √∫nico bueno al respecto.La Presentaci√≥n ligeramente buena, los platillos de verdad que nada memorables, un maridaje regular y porciones de vino limitadas.Afortunadamente tuve la suerte de poder disfrutar un d√≠a antes de una maravillosa cena en el restaurante del Chef Martin Berasategui: Oria; en aquel entonces no ten√≠an ni siquiera una estrella y la cena que disfrutamos ahi por mucho rebasa a la tragedia de cena de ABaC.Otro restaurante en el que disfrutamos una maravillosa cena y que descubrimos casi por accidente fue Lluerna, un poco fuera del radar pero vale much√≠simo la pena y los precios ademas son super accesibles en comparaci√≥n, ellos deber√≠an de tener las 3 estrellas Michelin de ABaC.Ojal√° mejoren, o si no que al menos no haya mas clientes enga√±ados como yo.
translation: I had a lot of expectations about this dinner, none were satisfied.The service seemed almost to not matter, robotic, without personality.The restaurant has an elegant and sober decor, I think the only good thing about it.The presentation is slightly good, the dishes are really nothing memorable, a regular pairing and limited portions of wine.Luckily I was lucky enough to be able to enjoy a day before a wonderful dinner in the restaurant of Chef Martin Berasategui: Oria; back then they didn't even have a star and the dinner we enjoyed there by a lot surpasses the tragedy of ABaC dinner.Another restaurant in which we enjoyed a wonderful dinner and discovered almost by accident was Lluerna, a little off the radar but it is very worth it and the prices are also super accessible by comparison, they should have the 3 Michelin stars of ABaC.Hopefully they will improve, or else at least there are no more cheated customers like me.

body: Nunca hab√≠amos visitado un 3 estrellas pero dudo mucho que esta sea su calidad si lo comparo a otros que hemos probado de tan solo 1..No digo que sea malo, pero hay varios aspectos que para mi son imperdonables si hablamos de un men√∫ de 210e.Lo primero y m√°s importante; hay poca innovacion/sorpresa, esperaba mucho m√°s con lo que le gusta la vanguardia a Jordi Cruz.La sequedad/frialdad de los camareros en general te hace sentir inc√≥modo.Hab√≠a varios platos (la especie de granizado de oliva, snack de foie y sobretodo dumpling de cerdo) que estaban con exceso de sal, adem√°s la masa del √∫ltimo estaba grumos, era dif√≠cil de comerla. Si sumamos todo, pese a que es una buena experiencia, creo que esta sobrevalorado; nosotros, almenos, no lo recomendar√≠amos.Esper√°bamos mucho m√°s de un restaurante con esas supuestas estrellas.
translation: We have never visited a 3 star hotel but I doubt very much that this is its quality if I compare it to others that we have tried of only 1..I do not say it is bad, but there are several aspects that for me are unforgivable if we talk about a menu of 210e.The first and most important; There is little innovation/surprise, I expected much more with what the avant-garde likes to Jordi Cruz.The dryness/coldness of the waiters in general makes you feel uncomfortable.There were several dishes (the kind of olive hail, foie snack and especially pork dumpling) that were with excess salt, plus the dough of the last was lumps, it was difficult to eat it. If we add everything up, even though it's a good experience, I think it's overrated; we, at least, wouldn't recommend it.We expected much more from a restaurant with those supposed stars.

body: Correcto. El local muy sobrio. El personal muy correcto, pero, tuvimos la sensaci√≥n de que estaban muy cansados. Pedimos el men√∫ largo. Empezamos en la terraza, y luego visitamos la cocina. Los snacks buenos... aunque echamos de menos que nos ofrecieran algo de beber. Momentos despu√©s pasamos al comedor... all√≠ nos sirvieron los primeros platos de men√∫: bloody mary, la Gilda, la ostra... la anguila ...impresionantes. El resto de platos muy buenos. Escogimos maridaje para acompa√±ar la experiencia. Bajo nuestro parecer, caro. Quiero decir que fue bueno, y, varias referencias nos sorprendieron. Simplemente nos pareci√≥ escaso... Los postres ricos, aunque, nos sirvieron una bola de chicle que ya lleg√≥ rota a la mesa. Volveremos, sin duda!
translation: Right. The place is very sober. The staff were very correct, but, we had the feeling that they were very tired. We ordered the long menu. We start on the terrace, and then visit the kitchen. The good snacks... although we missed that they offered us something to drink. Moments later we moved to the dining room... where we were served the first menu dishes: bloody mary, the Gilda, the oyster... the eel...awesome. The rest of the dishes are very good. We chose pairing to accompany the experience. In our opinion, expensive. I mean it was good, and, several references surprised us. We just found it scarce... The rich desserts, though, served us a ball of gum that has already arrived broken at the table. We'll be back, no doubt!

body: Fui con mi pareja a comer ya que hemos estado en varios restaurantes con estrella y me hac√≠a gracia ir al del famoso medi√°tico chef Jordi Cruz. Empezamos con unos entrantes en terraza que estaban bien aunque para nada espectaculares. Despu√©s no pasaron en la cocina d√≥nde nos sirvieron algunos aperitivos m√°s que estaban ricos aunque tampoco nada increible. Aqu√≠ en la cocina, el camarero que nos acompa√±√≥ nos choc√≥ por lo seco de su comportamiento, con actitud de resignaci√≥n y con muy pocas ganas. En su explicaci√≥n de la comida estaba tocando cont√≠nuamente los platos. Me pareci√≥ de muy mala educaci√≥n y por inri, no nos hab√≠amos acabado a√∫n la copa que nos pidi√≥ con prisas ir a la mesa. El resto de la comida nos pareci√≥ buena pero no hubo ning√∫n plato espectacular para un tres estrellas. Me pareci√≥ m√°s un restaurante de cadena hotelera, las mesas muy juntas, y detr√°s nuestro justo la mesa de guardar el pan y las botellas. No ten√≠amos sensaci√≥n de espacio, a diferencia de otros restaurantes, ya que pod√≠amos oir perfectamente la conversaci√≥n de la mesa de al lado.Con excepci√≥n del camarero de la cocina, el resto de personal que nos atendi√≥ fueron muy amables.En sala la comida era elaborada pero como he dicho no nos sorprendio ning√∫n plato. El tiempo de espera en algun momento de la comida me pareci√≥ excesivo. La chica que nos atendi√≥ era muy servicial y amable pero la pobre iba muy atareada y nos pareci√≥ que faltava personal.Otra curiosidad, o quiz√°s es normal, no nos recogieron las migas de pan hasta el final de la comida, antes de los postres. Sinceramente y en opini√≥n general, hemos estado a otros restaurantes con tres estrellas y con menos que nos han parecido mucho mejores. Pagamos c√≥mo un tres estrellas pero en mi opini√≥n no las merece.
translation: I went with my partner to eat since we have been in several star restaurants and I was amused to go to the one of the famous media chef Jordi Cruz. We started with some starters on the terrace that were good but not spectacular at all. Then they didn't spend in the kitchen where they served us some more snacks that were rich but also nothing incredible. Here in the kitchen, the waiter who accompanied us shocked us because of the dry behavior, with a resignation attitude and with very little desire. In his explanation of the food he was continuously touching the dishes. I thought it was very rude and inri, we hadn't finished the cup that asked us to go to the table in a hurry. The rest of the food seemed good to us but there was no spectacular dish for a three star. I thought it was more like a hotel chain restaurant, tables close together, and behind us just the table to store bread and bottles. We didn't have a feeling of space, unlike other restaurants, as we could perfectly hear the conversation from the table next door.With the exception of the kitchen waiter, the rest of the staff who treated us were very friendly.In the room the food was elaborate but as I said we were not surprised by any dishes. The waiting time at some point in the meal seemed excessive to me. The girl who treated us was very helpful and friendly but the poor girl was very busy and we found it lacking staff.Another curiosity, or perhaps it is normal, we did not pick up the breadcrumbs until the end of the meal, before desserts. Sincerely and in general opinion, we have been to other restaurants with three stars and with less that we have found much better. We pay like a three star but in my opinion it doesn't deserve them.

body: Regalo de mi pareja x mi 40 cumplea√±os, fuimos con muchas ganas d probar un tres estrellas Michelin y he de decir q estaba todo muy bueno pro nos sorprendi√≥ mas bien poco.... ya hemos probado muchos restaurantes con una estrella y quiz√°s esperabamos fuegos artificiales al subir hasta la tercera estrella y no pas√≥.... tb he d decir q habia dos men√∫s, el tradici√≥n y el gran abac, nosotros ibamos con la idea d hacer el gran abac y a la hora d escogerlo el camarero nos coment√≥ q si era la primera vez q ibamos mejor q cogieramos el tradici√≥n y as√≠ lo hicimos, por la mesa de al lado el otro nos hubiera gustado mas.... mas innovador y sorprendente.... nos dieron mucha enviadia y un poquito d r√°bia, jeje, tb decir q para los entrantes sobretodo los d cocina se nos hizo muy r√°pido, y con el camarero all√≠ mirandonos fijamente no pudimos saborear, comentar, etc... deberian dejar un poco mas d tiempo para q podamos degustar agusto y nunca mejor dicho .... lo dem√°s todo bien, para mi lo mejor d ese men√∫ fueron los postres.... y el restaurante en si es muy bonito.....volver a probar el Men√∫ Gran Abac??? No lo s√©...
translation: Gift from my partner x my 40th birthday, we were very eager to try a three Michelin stars and I have to say that it was all very good but surprised us rather little.... we have already tried many restaurants with a star and perhaps expected fireworks when climbing to the third star and did not pass...tb i have to say that there were two menus, the tradition and the great abac, we went with the idea of making the great abac and when choosing it the waiter told us that if it was the first time we were going better we took the tradition and so we did, by the table next door we would have liked more.... more innovative and surprising.... they gave us a lot of envy and a little bit of rage, hehe, tb to say that for the starters especially the ones of kitchen it was made us very fast, and with the waiter there staring at us we could not taste, comment, etc... should leave a little more time for that we can taste tastes and never better said .... the rest all well, for me the best of that menu were desserts...And the restaurant itself is very nice.....try again the Gran Abac Menu??? I don't know...

body: 100% recomendado, excelente  trato, comida exquisita, presentaciones de platos incre√≠bles, ambiente y decoraci√≥n indiscutible,  repetir√© con otro men√∫!
translation: 100% recommended, excellent treatment, exquisite food, amazing dishes presentations, atmosphere and undisputed decoration, I will repeat with another menu!

body: La comida del ABaC es espectacular, est√° muy cuidado el concepto y el men√∫ es largo y copioso; pero tampoco te queda un regusto tan sorprendente como para repetir, menos a ese precio. Creo que hay otros restaurantes de alta gama donde volver√≠a a repetir antes que ABaC, con o sin estrellas Michel√≠n.
translation: The ABaC's food is spectacular, the concept is very well maintained and the menu is long and copious; but you also don't have a taste that surprising to repeat, let alone at that price. I think there are other high-end restaurants where I would repeat before ABaC, with or without Michelin stars.

body: Experiencia decepcionante. Mi pareja es al√©rgica a las gambas y lactosa. Resumiendo mucho, aunque avis√© de ello en la reserva y al llegar, nos sirvieron un plato con gambas (con suerte eran visibles y no lo prob√≥), le pusieron en uno de los platos una teja de queso (dijeron que me la comiese yo) y por √∫ltimo, los postres en calaba (10 mini postres, adjunto foto con parte de ellos), de los cuales NO avisaron que eran con lactosa (por suerte lo preguntamos por precauci√≥n), dijeron textualmente "lo ideal ser√≠a que se lo coma ella, t√∫ s√≥lo puedes las fresas", para compensar nos pusieron una especie de mini tarta con los restos de postres que ya nos hab√≠an puesto. El encargado tir√≥ balones fuera y no quiso entender que pusieron varias veces la salud de mi pareja en riesgo. En un restaurante de esa categor√≠a y con lo que pagamos, no pueden permitirse un servicio tan nefasto. Jordi Cruz no estaba, tal vez el desastre fuera por eso..
translation: Disappointing experience. My partner is allergic to shrimp and lactose. In short, although I warned about it in the reserve and when we arrived, they served us a dish with prawns (hopefully they were visible and did not taste it), put in one of the dishes a shingle of cheese (they said I should eat it myself) and finally, the desserts in calaba (10 mini desserts, attached photo with part of them), of which they did NOT warn that they were with lactose (luckily we asked it out of caution), said textually "the ideal would be that she eats it, you can only eat the strawberries", to compensate we put a kind of mini tart with the remains of desserts that had already put us. The manager threw balls out and didn't want to understand that they put my partner's health at risk several times. In a restaurant of this category and with what we pay, they cannot afford such a disastrous service. Jordi Cruz wasn't there, maybe disaster was because of that.

body: Hemos ido a comer en pareja para una celebracion. Hay 2 menus degustacion nosotros hicimos el gran abac 180 euros/persona + bebidas. Menu muy extenso, cuesta acabarlo!! Servicio muy amable. Al principio te muestran un peque√±o tour por la cocina de abac. Producto de calidad nos gusto mucho la gamba, la cazuelita de esparde√±as, la ostra con ceviche, postre de chocolate. Es excelente como menu degustacion. Te quedas muy llena, mejor ir a comer k a cenar . Merece la pena para una ocasion especial, el ambiente muy tranquilo
translation: We've gone for a couple lunch for a celebration. There are 2 tasting menus we made the great abac 180 euros/person + drinks. Very extensive menu, it is difficult to finish it!! Very friendly service. At first they show you a little tour of abac's kitchen. Quality product we really like shrimp, casserole of sparde√±as, oyster with ceviche, chocolate dessert. It's excellent as a tasting menu. You stay very full, better go to lunch k to dinner. It is worth it for a special occasion, the atmosphere very quiet

body: La verdad es que salimos en general encantados con la comida, no tanto con algunos detalles que cuando pagas mas de 400‚Ç¨ se consideran imperdonables. La verdad es que esta entre las 3 y las 4 , pero bueno... Platos que nos sorprendieron en sabor, Gamba, Cochinillo, Postre chocolate fr√°gil, Pan chino con Anguila , espardenya, pintalabios postre...Resto de platos muy correctos pero con sabores mucho mas familiares y reconocibles de otros restaurante mas normalitos.Nos gusto la sincronia entre platos y la relaci√≥n de los diferentes componentes de la mesa.Ahora viene lo que no nos gust√≥:En General tanto la entrada como la salida ( sobretodo la Salida ) fue de un trato bastante fr√≠o, b√°sicamente para entrar tuvimos que buscar nosotros a alguien para que nos indicara el camino , y al salir b√°sicamente despu√©s de cobrar , no recibimos un simple adi√≥s de nadie. ( Es qeu te acompa√±an a la salida hasta en los restaurantes Chinos !)Otro tema es que al principio parece que hubo una confusi√≥n y nos dec√≠an que nuestra reserva era un cheque regalo y ya estaba pagada! No pod√≠a ser para nosotros y no quisimos aprovecharnos de la situaci√≥n porque no seria correcto ya que seguramente iba dirigido a otra persona que vendr√≠a despu√©s. Lo comprobaron y como lo pudieron verificar con la supuesta persona del regalo nos dijeron que de momento nos cobrar√≠an todo. ( Y LAS GRACIAS AL MENOS ?? ) ni eso, la verdad es que cuando haces este tipo de cosas aunque es lo honrado al menos te espera unas gracias , pues no.Errores que creo que hay que solucionar algunos mas urgentes que otros.Tambi√©n hay que decir que tuvimos la suerte de estar hace unos meses en el Celler de Can Roca y siempre se tiende a comparar. Lo primero es que el All√≠ si vimos a los hermanos Roca , nos saludaron nada mas entrar con un trato muy cercano, aqu√≠ no apareci√≥ Jordi Cruz y la verdad es molesto cuando cuesta lo que cuesta.Ademas el trato en la entrada y Salida nada que ver, 1¬∫ La idea del comer en la cocina est√° muy bien , pero al menos nosotros nos sentimos que estorbamos, y a los cocineros se les ve√≠a inc√≥modos muchas veces al no poder pasar e ir esquivando personas. Como el espacio es el que es , esta muy bien que te ense√±en la cocina y como trabajan , pero una vez visto comes tranquila mente en la mesa o en otra zona donde molestes menos.2¬∫ Esto lo consideramos imperdonable o al menos da una imagen horrible que no he visto en ning√∫n restaurante sea cual sea su categor√≠a, y es que en uno de los platos  donde se servia en la mesa un caldo de verduras, aparecieron con un recipiente donde se ve√≠a una bolsa " ademas mal cortada " con todas las verduras dentro que luego filtraban. Esta muy bien que quieras ense√±ar como han sido cocinadas , pero la verdad que la imagen de la bolsa queda horrible daba la sensaci√≥n de comida pre cocinada de super, En Resumen una buena experiencia gastron√≥mica en general con una serie de fallos que rebajan la experiencia final.
translation: The truth is that we leave generally delighted with the food, not so much with some details that when you pay more than 400‚Ç¨ are considered unforgivable. The truth is, it's between 3 and 4, but... Dishes that surprised us in flavor, shrimp, suckling pig, fragile chocolate dessert, Chinese bread with eel, spardenya, lipstick dessert... Rest of dishes very correct but with much more familiar and recognizable flavors of other restaurant more normal.We liked the synchrony between dishes and the relationship of the different components of the table.Now comes what we did not like: In general both the entrance and the exit ( especially the Exit ) was of a rather cold treatment, basically to enter we had to look for someone to tell us the way, and when leaving basically after charging, we did not receive a simple goodbye. (It is that they accompany you to the exit even in the Chinese restaurants !)Another issue is that at first it seems that there was a confusion and they told us that our reservation was a gift check and it was already paid! It couldn't be for us and we didn't want to take advantage of the situation because it wouldn't be right as it was surely aimed at someone else who would come next. They checked it out and as they could verify it with the supposed person of the gift they told us that at the moment they would charge us everything. ( AND THANK YOU AT LEAST ?? ) neither that, the truth is that when you do this kind of thing although it is the honored at least awaits you a few thanks, because no.Mistakes that I think we have to solve some more urgent than others.Also to say that we were lucky to be a few months ago in the Celler de Can Roca and always tends to compare. The first thing is that there if we saw the Roca brothers, they greeted us as soon as we entered with a very close treatment, here Jordi Cruz did not appear and the truth is annoying when it costs what it costs.Also the deal at the entrance and Exit nothing to see, 1¬∫ The idea of eating in the kitchen is very good,

body: Hab√≠amos ido al angle y la verdad es que Jordi Cruz supera el concepto que ten√≠amos de su cocina con el ABAC. Original el hecho de tener tres ambientes (aunque puede ser apretado en cocina si hay mucha gente). Comida abundante en el sal√≥n, sorprendente y con mucho sabor. Tal vez lo √∫nico malo fue la gesti√≥n de los tiempos entre platos.El resto... espectacular!
translation: We had gone to the angle and the truth is that Jordi Cruz surpasses the concept we had of his kitchen with the ABAC. It is original to have three different atmospheres (although it can be very busy in the kitchen if there are a lot of people). Abundant food in the lounge, surprising and with a lot of flavor. Perhaps the only bad thing was the management of the times between dishes.The rest... spectacular!even in Chinese restaurants !)Another issue is that at first it seems that there was a confusion and we were told that our reservation was a gift check and was already paid! It couldn't be for us and we didn't want to take advantage of the situation because it wouldn't be right as it was surely aimed at someone else who would come next. The first thing is that there if we saw the Roca brothers, they greeted us as soon as we entered with a very close treatment, here Jordi Cruz did not appear and the truth is annoying when it costs what it costs.Also the deal at the entrance and Exit nothing to see, 1¬∫ The idea of eating in the kitchen is very good,

body: Vaya por delante que comimos bastante bi√©n y el trato muy correcto.Pero no creo que se merezca las 3 estrellas, por varios motivos :SERVICIO, Muy des coordinado, poco atento y desbordado por la autentica Gimcana que supone el recorrido por el restaurante.COCINA , la cocina es muy justa y se ve poco ordenada, aunque si definida, mucha gente deambulando.VAJILLA, Sin duda lo peor, es basta, poco elegante, y molesta en algunas ocasiones el volumen de la misma.MENU , Nada especial, mucha puesta en escena , pero ninguna sorpresa, quiz√°s los calamares deconstruidos, Muy mal los postres, el tema del globo es de muy poco nivel.La guinda de la comida es que no te entregan la carta de los platos que has comido en el MEN√ú.En pocas palabras, algunos restaurantes de 2 ESTRELLAS superan a ABAC con creces.
